answers.author: Peter Dunn
answers.text:
Hi Susan,
You'll need to get in touch with ICMA-RC for information about your retirement account. (ICMA-RC is affiliated with ICMA, but is a separate entity.) You can visit their website at www.icma-rc.org, or call 1-800-669-7400.

answers.author: Roger Kolman
answers.text:
Susan,
You will want to consult with your tax advisor and/or your estate planner as well before setting up your monthly withdrawls.  Enjoy your retirement!

author: Susan Fritz
text:
Hi. I am a retiree and would like to know how to :
1.  in the future start a monthly payment of my account, automatically deposited and 
2.   How do I request a one time check to use for a special need asap?
Please answer right away if possible.  I have to use the library computer so it would be nice, otherwise.  I can be reached at my vacation home 1 218 927 6601..its 3 pm here, so I should be home by 5 our time.. You may leave a message as I am the only person to get it.  DO NOT leave a msg at my home number in Bloomington.
thak you
title: Benefits
